pitch.cc: That was pitch number 75 for Chris Carpenter; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .274 average in the first 75 pitches but they hit .316 off him after that.
Chris Carpenter may be running out of gas after 79 pitches; his fastball has dropped from a high of 95 to as low as 87.
